item.title: How JavaScript Execute Code
item.description: {} - This is our Global Execution Context (this) Note: Global Execution Context is different in various environment like Node, Browser, Bun, etc. It is a window object in browser and a empty object in a runtime like Nodejs. Types of Execution Contexts Link to heading There are mainly three types of global execution contexts: Global Execution Context Functional Execution Context Eval Execution Context (Good to Know, mainly used in mongoose) How JS code is Executed?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi 👋, I’m Vasu Link to heading A passionate full stack developer from India Link to heading 🌱 I’m currently learning DSA & Full Stack Development 👨‍💻 All of my projects are available at My Portfolio 📫 Email: vasujain275@gmail.com Connect with me Link to heading Languages and Tools Link to heading

item.title: Projects
item.description: Welcome to my coding journey! 🛤️ I’m a creative explorer of programming languages and technologies, including: C++ for powerful and efficient code. 💪 Python for versatile scripting and data manipulation. 🐍 JavaScript and TypeScript for dynamic web applications. 🌐 React for building interactive user interfaces. ⚛️ Node.js and Express for server-side development. 🖥️ MongoDB and MySQL for data storage and management. 📊 HTML and CSS for crafting beautiful web experiences. 🎨 Docker for containerization and deployment.
